content: stuff the muzzle f/o leave a tail for sewing 3 4 nose make two start with a chain of 12 round 1 slip_stitch into the first chain to form a circle chain 1 make 1 single_crochet in each of the following 12 single_crochet 12 f/o leave a tail for sewing body start with a magic_ring round 1 6 single_crochet in the magic_ring 6 round 2 increase * 6 12 round 3 1 single_crochet increase * 6 18 round 4 2 single_crochet increase * 6 24 round 5 3 single_crochet increase * 6 30 round 6 4 single_crochet increase * 6 36 round 7 5 single_crochet increase * 6 42 round 8 6 single_crochet increase * 6 48 round 9 7 single_crochet increase * 6 54 round 10 8 single_crochet increase * 6 60 round 11 to 17 1 single_crochet in each stitch 60 round 18 8 single_crochet decrease * 6 54 round 19 - 20 1 single_crochet in each stitch 54 round 21 7 single_crochet decrease * 6 48 round 22 1 single_crochet in each stitch 48 round 23 6 single_crochet decrease * 6 42 round 24 1 single_crochet in each stitch 42 start stuffing the body and keep stuffing as you go round 25 5 single_crochet decrease * 6 36 round 26 1 single_crochet in each stitch 36 round 27 4 single_crochet decrease * 6 30 round 28 - 29 1 single_crochet in each stitch 30 f/o leave a tail for sewing 5 arm make two start with a magic_ring using a different shade round 1 6 single_crochet in the magic_ring 6 round 2 increase * 6 12 round 3 1 single_crochet increase * 6 18 round 4 2 single_crochet increase * 6 24 switch to the body color round 5 in blo 1 single_crochet in each stitch 24 round 6 - 14 1 single_crochet in each stitch 24 stuff the arm f/o leave a tail for sewing leg make two start with a magic_ring using a different shade round 1 6 single_crochet in the magic_ring 6 round 2 increase * 6 12 round 3 1 single_crochet increase * 6 18 round 4 2 single_crochet increase * 6 24 round 5 3 single_crochet increase * 6 30 switch to body color round 6 in blo 1 single_crochet in each stitch 30 round 7 to 17 1 single_crochet in each stitch 30 stuff the leg f/o leave a tail for sewing assembling using the orange tail wrong sides facing each other sew the pink side of the ear to the orange side of the ear the pink side should be centered placed lower than the center of the orange side 6 folding the lower half of the ear so that the two edges are touching sew a total of 8 stitches together - 4 on each side place the muzzle right under the eyes - it should cover round 12 to round 25 the increased side of the muzzle should be the one closer to the eyes 7 the nostrils
